user.title: Choose a load or device to add

data.name: Name

battery.title: Edit your battery device
battery.description: If you don't have a charge/discharge sensor, you can set both inverter sensors in the solar plant configuration

solar.description: setup only one of the two inverters sensor if you have only one

data.inverter_input_power_sensor: Inverter input power sensor (W, kW) (solar production)

charger.title: Create your electrical vehicle charger
charger.description: OCPP and Wallbox are natively supported now, or a generic one

menu_options.charger_generic: Create a Generic based charger, need tto have the proper entities to be up and running

data.name: Name

data.power_sensor: Power sensor for the charger (W, kW)
